142.title: Implement MCP Server Resources - AST Content Serving

acceptanceCriteria.text: All ast:// URI patterns are fully supported
Resources provide rich, structured content
Integration with existing database systems works seamlessly
Performance meets MCP response time requirements (<200ms)
Proper error handling for missing resources
Content formats are consistent and well-structured
Resource discovery works correctly
URI Patterns: ast://nodes/{nodeId} - Individual AST node data
URI Patterns: ast://files/{filePath} - Complete file AST data
URI Patterns: ast://search/{query} - Search results as resource
URI Patterns: ast://changes - Recent changes feed
Node resources include complete metadata and source code snippets
File resources include hierarchical node tree representation
Search resources integrate with vector database
Changes resources track recent modifications
Multiple format support (JSON, Markdown, HTML)
Syntax highlighting in markdown format
Unit tests for URI parsing and resource generation
Integration tests with MCP protocol
Performance benchmarks for resource serving

existingWork.summary: MCP resources framework exists with basic implementations

partialImplementations.description: Resource framework with URI parsing, basic handlers for all resource types but minimal content generation
Tests for resource list and basic resource reading functionality

completeWork.description: Resource discovery and listing works correctly
MCP resource protocol types and interfaces are complete
